member.name: NTFS_FILE_RECORD_OUTPUT_BUFFER
member.summary: Receives output data from theFSCTL_GET_NTFS_FILE_RECORD control code.

member.name: NTFS_FILE_RECORD_OUTPUT_BUFFER.FileReferenceNumber
member.summary: The file identifier of the returned file record. This is not necessarily the file identifier specified in the FileReferenceNumber member of the structure. Refer to the Remarks section of the reference page forFSCTL_GET_NTFS_FILE_RECORD for more information.

member.name: NTFS_FILE_RECORD_OUTPUT_BUFFER.FileRecordLength
member.summary: The length of the returned file record, in bytes.

member.name: NTFS_FILE_RECORD_OUTPUT_BUFFER.FileRecordBuffer
member.summary: The starting location of the buffer for the returned file record.
